Distributed file system built for AI training and inference workloads

Related repos

  • Filesystem explicitly designed for AI agents
  • self-hosted file server with uploads, downloads, search, webdav
  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • DeepSeek open-source AI infrastructure repos
  • DeepClaude: Combines DeepSeek R1 and Claude 3.5 for AI reasoning and coding
  • unified multimodal model for both understanding and generating images and text
